body_html: Yes, I agree that lock will make things slower. But the program without lock sometimes has behavior that is unrepeatable. IMHO, the lock is not needed when the sess.run is only called inside a single thread but for multithread program, it's better to add it.
body_text: Yes, I agree that lock will make things slower. But the program without lock sometimes has behavior that is unrepeatable. IMHO, the lock is not needed when the sess.run is only called inside a single thread but for multithread program, it's better to add it.
body: Yes, I agree that lock will make things slower. But the program without lock sometimes has behavior that is unrepeatable. IMHO, the lock is not needed when the sess.run is only called inside a single thread but for multithread program, it's better to add it.
